pages.text: $(li)The Gold Nugget is a shiny part of the Gold Ingot that can be crafted placing a Gold Ingot in a Crafting Table.$(br)$(li)You can obtain it Smelting Gold Armors, Weapons and Tools in a Furnace or Blast Furnace.

$(li)This item can be used in multiple crafts in a Crafting Table.$(br)$(li)Gold Lanterns$(li)Gilded Blackstone$(li)Glistering Melon Slice$(li)Gold Ingot$(li)Golden Carrot$(li)Key$(li)Golden Pet Bandage$(li)Gold Gate$(li)Gold Chain$(li)Golden Frog Leg
$(li)Some mobs like Rotten Burning Piglins, Volines and Zombified Piglins may drops it too.$(br)$(li)You can trade Gold Nuggets with the Piglins, just drop it in front of them.
